label: Travel and Adventure
description: Market category for travel and adventure related search queries.
intents: Find and book travel accommodations and activities

subcategories.label: Safari and Wildlife
subcategories.description: Travel and adventure experiences centered around observing and interacting with wildlife in their natural habitats.

subcategories.label: Cruises and Sailing
subcategories.description: Travel and adventure experiences centered around sailing and cruising on the open sea or other bodies of water.

subcategories.label: Hiking and Trekking
subcategories.description: Travel and adventure experiences centered around hiking and trekking through natural landscapes.

subcategories.label: Beach and Island
subcategories.description: Travel and adventure experiences centered around beaches and islands.

subcategories.label: Cultural and Historical
subcategories.description: Travel and adventure experiences centered around cultural and historical landmarks and events.
